title: Creating Stylish and Sexy Photography
description:
Creating Stylish and Sexy Photography: A Guide to Glamour Portraiture (Fast Photo Expert)

by Chris Nelson
 <a href="
https://d202m5krfqbpi5.cloudfront.net/books/1354898377l/16144170.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://d202m5krfqbpi5.cloudfront.net/books/1354898377l/16144170.jpg</a>

about book :-

Straightforward lessons and instructional images offer an efficient way to learn the key elements of successful glamour photography in this inspiring guide. The photography in the book uses real women, just as photographers of any skill level will be working with everyday people, and the book takes photographers through the process of creating flattering, individualized portraits that accentuate each subjectÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best features and minimize any areas about which they might be self-conscious. In addition to useful insights on lighting and posing techniques, it provides ample guidance on the delicate issue of the subjectÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s emotional comfortÃ¢â‚¬â€a critical factor in the success of the images and the client's happiness with the session. The book addresses different locations and natural versus artificial lighting scenarios, and also includes extensive postproduction tips and tricks.


About the Author :-

Chris Nelson began his career as a photojournalist and reporter, but in 1991,
he quit his full-time newspaper gig and started a photography studio, which he
moved to Fall Creek, Wisconsin a few years later.
Chris has earned his Master Photographer, Outstanding Photographic
Achievement, and Exceptional Photographic Achievement accolades from
WPPI. He earned his Master of Photography degree from PPA and was named
PPA Photographer of the Year in 2009. A number of his images have earned
merits in WPPI and PPA competitions. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best known for his high-school
senior and glamour images. Locally, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s known as a wedding stylist as well. His
work has been highlighted in a number of books on professional photography.

Chris Nelson is an award-winning professional photographer, a studio owner, and the author of Master Guide to Glamour Photography. He lives in Fall Creek, Wisconsin.
